reviews.review_msg: Literally have no bad things to say about Isabel. She's caring, insightful, and puts a lot of effort into making classes interesting and engaging. I'd recommend her to anyone looking to work on their Spanish.

Fantastic professor. First time I've ever had a prof encourage you to reach out for extra help and actually mean it. Classes are fun, prof is caring and engaging, and the textbook is pretty straightforward.
I loved this class. Most of the movies were great, with some exceptions. You have to participate in online discussions, which takes time, but I really like to read others opinions.
